patthana18.28:1.1: Saraṇaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.28:2.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
